description:
Documentation on: https://apidocs.dynalist.io/

The best outlining app for your best work
Where brilliant ideas are captured, fleshed out, and realized.

Actions:
- Get all documents and folders
- Make changes to documents and folders
- Get content of a document
- Check if documents has been updated
- Make change to the content of a document

(not official)

If you feel there is something missing feel free to shoot an email to clasicwebtools[@]gmail.com
name: Dynalist API
plugin_instructions:
1 - Install the plugin into your app
2 - Create your Adalo APP and get API key at https://dynalist.io/developer
3 - add your api key and start using the actions from the plugin
